alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Madera (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 5:28PM PDT until March 12 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Madera County in central California... Central Fresno County in central California... * Until 615 PM PDT. * At 528 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kerman, or 12 miles south of Madera, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fresno, Kerman, Raisin City and Biola. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
